channel.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
channel.description:
I often feel like the days are extremely short. here is a simple example. Let's say i am Paladin with a guilty report on 16.
First thing i will do is whisper the king about it, and give him some time to out it. This might take like 30 seconds. Then if he didn't (which happens often), i will out it myself. Then people often take easily 30 seconds to vote him up. 30 seconds is left. Now if for any reason we pardon him because he is fool, this gives us literally no time to do anything else.
What i would like is, instead make the days 4 minutes, but when at least 60 seconds of the day has passed, the king is allowed to end the day.

item.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Perhaps a custom game mode where you can choose how long the days are

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I think it would be fun if the days sped up after X amount of time.

Maybe after a week (7 days) the days grow shorter because it’s winter time.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Yeah I like the day length , it kind of feels frantic , which I like .

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Longer days is a Nerf to scum, I think the days are fine as is.

item.title: [Suggestion] Longer days
item.dc:creator: slappy
item.description:
I feel like it’s more fun with shorter days because it makes you follow your gut more, which I find fun. Also the games seem to be timed perfectly lasting average 20 mins ??

Read full topic
